column15: it can cause serious problems like hair fall; to help you deal with dandruff effectively

column18: lustrous and manageable mane. No dandruff means that you are free from the annoying flakes and the itchy feeling. A healthy

infection free scalp is important for hair growth and this conditioner efficiently keeps your scalp thoroughly cleansed.

column16:
'desc': [u'

VLCC Hair Fall Repair Shampoo (200 ml) Price: Rs.174

Losing hair owing to the adverse effects of environmental pollutants and lack of nourishment can become very annoying. VLCC has developed a Hair Fall Repair Shampoo to help you protect your hair from falling and losing its luster. An innovative and effective combination of Hibiscus and Coconut is made use of in this Hair Fall Repair Shampoo from VLCC. The regular use of this VLCC Shampoo will strengthen the roots of your hair and thus fortify them.

The deep conditioning aspect of coconut will seep into the hair roots and provide extra conditioning to make the hair strands soft and strong. Hibiscus is a proven hair rejuvenator which is replete in minerals that can arrest hair fall and make your hair look lustrous and healthy. Moreover
column17:
your hair will be protected from pollution and damage by the hydrolyzed keratin infused in this VLCC Shampoo.

Directions to Use

• Wet your hair.
• Apply an adequate amount of the VLCC Repair Shampoo on to the hair and scalp.
• Massage it gently into the scalp and leave it on for two to three minutes.
• Rinse off all the shampoo using water.

']
